name: Bubble Gun (Ivy Juice Games, Linus Gärtig, Gino Georgiev, vlad3d)
name_original: Bubble Gun (Ivy Juice Games, Linus Gärtig, Gino Georgiev, vlad3d)
description:
DOWNLOAD HERE

Use bubbles to solve puzzles.

This game was created for the Playtesting Jam #1.

If the menu bubbles wobble through the screen, just open and close the menu again.

W, A, S, D - move

Mouse - look around

Left Mouse Button - blow air / create bubble

Right Mouse Button -

E - toggle Blower/-Bubbe-Gun

SHIFT  - hold while moving towards a big buble to step inside

ESC / P - pause the game

  • Vlad
  • Linus
  • Gino

LeanTween

Ultimate Game Music Collection

Universal Sound FX
